BIDSVersion.description: The version of the BIDS standard that was used

HEDVersion.description: If HED tags are used: The version of the HED schema used to validate HED tags for study. May include a single schema or a base schema and one or more library schema.

DatasetLinks.description: Used to map a given <dataset-name> from a BIDS URI of the form bids:<dataset-name>:path/within/dataset to a local or remote location.

DatasetType.description: The interpretation of the dataset. For backwards compatibility, the default value is 'raw'. Must be one of: 'raw', 'derivative'.

License.description: The license for the dataset. The use of license name abbreviations is RECOMMENDED for specifying a license.

Authors.description: List of individuals who contributed to the creation/curation of the dataset.

Acknowledgements.description: Text acknowledging contributions of individuals or institutions beyond those listed in Authors or Funding.

HowToAcknowledge.description: Text containing instructions on how researchers using this dataset should acknowledge the original authors.

Funding.description: List of sources of funding (grant numbers).

EthicsApprovals.description: List of ethics committee approvals of the research protocols and/or protocol identifiers.

ReferencesAndLinks.description: List of references to publications that contain information on the dataset. A reference may be textual or a URI.

DatasetDOI.description: The Digital Object Identifier of the dataset (not the corresponding paper). DOIs SHOULD be expressed as a valid URI; bare DOIs such as 10.0.2.3/dfjj.10 are DEPRECATED.

Name.description: Name of the pipeline or process that generated the outputs. Use 'Manual' to indicate the derivatives were generated by hand, or adjusted manually after an initial run of an automated pipeline.

Description.description: Plain-text description of the pipeline or process that generated the outputs. Recommended if Name is 'Manual'.

CodeURL.description: URL where the code used to generate the dataset may be found.

GeneratedBy.description: Used to specify provenance of the dataset.

SourceDatasets.description: Used to specify the locations and relevant attributes of all source datasets.
